title: Chicken and fresh herb stock
ingredients: ['1 chicken carcass or the bones from 4 chicken pieces, cooked or raw, or 1 raw chicken leg quarter, about 250 g (8½ oz)', '1 onion, quartered', '1 large carrot, roughly chopped', '1 celery stick, cut into chunks', '1 bay leaf', '1 sprig of parsley, stalk bruised', '1 sprig of fresh thyme', '8 black peppercorns', '½ tsp salt']
